00045 //For File I/O
00046 #define OSCL_HAS_GLOB 0
00047 #define OSCL_HAS_ANSI_FILE_IO_SUPPORT 1
00048 #define OSCL_HAS_ANSI_64BIT_FILE_IO_SUPPORT 0
00049 #define OSCL_HAS_MSWIN_FILE_IO_SUPPORT 0
00050 #define OSCL_HAS_SYMBIAN_COMPATIBLE_IO_FUNCTION 0
00051 #define OSCL_HAS_NATIVE_FILE_CACHE_ENABLE 1
00052 #define OSCL_FILE_BUFFER_MAX_SIZE   32768
00053 #define OSCL_HAS_PV_FILE_CACHE  0
00054 #define OSCL_HAS_LARGE_FILE_SUPPORT 1

00056 //For Sockets
00057 #define OSCL_HAS_SYMBIAN_SOCKET_SERVER 0
00058 #define OSCL_HAS_SYMBIAN_DNS_SERVER 0
00059 #define OSCL_HAS_BERKELEY_SOCKETS 1
00060 #define OSCL_HAS_SOCKET_SUPPORT 1
00061 
00062 //basic socket types
00063 typedef int TOsclSocket;
00064 typedef struct sockaddr_in TOsclSockAddr;
00065 typedef socklen_t TOsclSockAddrLen;
00066 
00067 //Init addr macro, inet_addr returns an uint32
00068 #define OsclValidInetAddr(addr) (inet_addr(addr)!=INADDR_NONE)
00069 
00070 //address conversion macro-- from string to network address.
00071 #define OsclMakeSockAddr(sockaddr,port,addrstr,ok)\
00072     sockaddr.sin_family=OSCL_AF_INET;\
00073     sockaddr.sin_port=htons(port);\
00074     int32 result=inet_aton((const char*)addrstr,&sockaddr.sin_addr);\
00075     ok=(result!=0);
00076 
00077 //address conversion macro-- from network address to string
00078 #define OsclUnMakeSockAddr(sockaddr,addrstr)\
00079     addrstr=inet_ntoa(sockaddr.sin_addr);
00080 
00081 //wrappers for berkeley socket calls
00082 #define OsclSetRecvBufferSize(s,val,ok,err) \
00083         ok=(setsockopt(s,SOL_SOCKET,SO_RCVBUF,(char*)&val, sizeof(int)) !=-1);\
00084         if (!ok)err=errno
00085 
00086 #define OsclBind(s,addr,ok,err)\
00087     TOsclSockAddr* tmpadr = &addr;\
00088     sockaddr* sadr = OSCL_STATIC_CAST(sockaddr*, tmpadr);\
00089     ok=(bind(s,sadr,sizeof(addr))!=(-1));\
00090     if (!ok)err=errno
00091 
00092 #define OsclJoin(s,addr,ok,err)\
00093 {\
00094         struct ip_mreq mreq; \
00095             void* p = &addr; \
00096         ok=(bind(s,(sockaddr*)p,sizeof(addr))!=(-1));\
00097         mreq.imr_multiaddr.s_addr = addr.sin_addr.s_addr ; \
00098         mreq.imr_interface.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY); \
00099         ok=(setsockopt(s, IPPROTO_IP, IP_ADD_MEMBERSHIP, &mreq, sizeof(struct ip_mreq))!=(-1)); \
00100         if (!ok)err=errno;\
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 #define OsclListen(s,size,ok,err)\
00105     ok=(listen(iSocket,qSize)!=(-1));\
00106     if (!ok)err=errno
00107 
00108 #define OsclAccept(s,accept_s,ok,err,wouldblock)\
00109     accept_s=accept(s,NULL,NULL);\
00110     ok=(accept_s!=(-1));\
00111     if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN||err==EWOULDBLOCK);}
00112 
00113 #define OsclSetNonBlocking(s,ok,err)\
00114     ok=(fcntl(s,F_SETFL,O_NONBLOCK)!=(-1));\
00115     if (!ok)err=errno
00116 
00117 #define OsclShutdown(s,how,ok,err)\
00118     ok=(shutdown(iSocket,how)!=(-1));\
00119     if (!ok)err=errno
00120 
00121 #define OsclSocket(s,fam,type,prot,ok,err)\
00122     s=socket(fam,type,prot);\
00123     ok=(s!=(-1));\
00124     if (!ok)err=errno
00125 
00126 #define OsclSendTo(s,buf,len,addr,ok,err,nbytes,wouldblock)\
00127     TOsclSockAddr* tmpadr = &addr;\
00128     sockaddr* sadr = OSCL_STATIC_CAST(sockaddr*, tmpadr);\
00129     nbytes=sendto(s,(const void*)(buf),(size_t)(len),0,sadr,(socklen_t)sizeof(addr));\
00130     ok=(nbytes!=(-1));\
00131     if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN||err==EWOULDBLOCK);}
00132 
00133 #define OsclSend(s,buf,len,ok,err,nbytes,wouldblock)\
00134     nbytes=send(s,(const void*)(buf),(size_t)(len),0);\
00135     ok=(nbytes!=(-1));\
00136     if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN||err==EWOULDBLOCK);}
00137 
00138 #define OsclCloseSocket(s,ok,err)\
00139     ok=(close(s)!=(-1));\
00140     if (!ok)err=errno
00141 
00142 #define OsclConnect(s,addr,ok,err,wouldblock)\
00143     TOsclSockAddr* tmpadr = &addr;\
00144     sockaddr* sadr = OSCL_STATIC_CAST(sockaddr*, tmpadr);\
00145     ok=(connect(s,sadr,sizeof(addr))!=(-1));\
00146     if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EINPROGRESS);}
00147 
00148 #define OsclGetAsyncSockErr(s,ok,err)\
00149     int opterr;socklen_t optlen=sizeof(opterr);\
00150     ok=(getsockopt(s,SOL_SOCKET,SO_ERROR,(void *)&opterr,&optlen)!=(-1));\
00151     if(ok)err=opterr;else err=errno;
00152 
00153 //unix reports connect completion in write set in the getsockopt
00154 //error.
00155 #define OsclConnectComplete(s,wset,eset,success,fail,ok,err)\
00156     success=fail=false;\
00157     if (FD_ISSET(s,&eset))\
00158     {fail=true;OsclGetAsyncSockErr(s,ok,err);}\
00159     else if (FD_ISSET(s,&wset))\
00160     {OsclGetAsyncSockErr(s,ok,err);if (ok && err==0)success=true;else fail=true;}
00161 
00162 #define OsclRecv(s,buf,len,ok,err,nbytes,wouldblock)\
00163     nbytes=recv(s,(void *)(buf),(size_t)(len),0);\
00164     ok=(nbytes!=(-1));\
00165     if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN);}
00166 
00167 #define OsclRecvFrom(s,buf,len,paddr,paddrlen,ok,err,nbytes,wouldblock)\
00168 {\
00169 void* p=paddr;\
00170 nbytes=recvfrom(s,(void*)(buf),(size_t)(len),0,(struct sockaddr*)p,paddrlen);\
00171     ok=(nbytes!=(-1));\
00172     if (!ok){err=errno;wouldblock=(err==EAGAIN);}\
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 #define OsclSocketSelect(nfds,rd,wr,ex,timeout,ok,err,nhandles)\
00177     nhandles=select(nfds,&rd,&wr,&ex,&timeout);\
00178     ok=(nhandles!=(-1));\
00179     if (!ok)err=errno
00180 
00181 //there's not really any socket startup needed on unix, but
00182 //you need to define a signal handler for SIGPIPE to avoid
00183 //broken pipe crashes.
00184 #define OsclSocketStartup(ok)\
00185     signal(SIGPIPE,SIG_IGN);\
00186     ok=true
00187 
00188 #define OsclSocketCleanup(ok)\
00189     signal(SIGPIPE,SIG_DFL);\
00190     ok=true
00191 
00192 //hostent type
00193 typedef struct hostent TOsclHostent;
00194 
00195 //wrapper for gethostbyname
00196 #define OsclGethostbyname(name,hostent,ok,err)\
00197     hostent=gethostbyname((const char*)name);\
00198     ok=(hostent!=NULL);\
00199     if (!ok)err=errno;
00200 
00201 //extract dotted address from a hostent
00202 #define OsclGetDottedAddr(hostent,dottedaddr,ok)\
00203     long *_hostaddr=(long*)hostent->h_addr_list[0];\
00204     struct in_addr _inaddr;\
00205     _inaddr.s_addr=*_hostaddr;\
00206     dottedaddr=inet_ntoa(_inaddr);\
00207     ok=(dottedaddr!=NULL);
00208

00211 #define OSCL_SD_SEND SHUT_WR
00212 #define OSCL_SD_BOTH SHUT_RDWR
